descriptionHtml:
This armor can be crafted at any forge, is fully upgradeable, and is also available in a chest inside of High Horgath where the Greybeards live in the main hall. This mod does not replace the standard dragonbone armor it adds new items and no DLC is required for this mod. It works with all body types, races, male/female characters, and your followers. It is more powerful then the standard version and includes two helms to choose from.

This mod has different textures then my other Mod that adds gold armor and weapons to the game and was originally made for people without the Dawnguard DLC. I decided to keep the old textures for this mod that way you can have the option to use both sets of armor in game. The mod with the dragonbone weapons and new armor textures can be found here, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40206/

Other Mods for Skyrim
